title: Air Force to Unveil Training, Grooming, Fitness Changes Next Year
description: New Air Force rules governing religious accommodations for facial hair and new fitness programs probably won’t arrive until 2026.
content:
Audio of this article is brought to you by the Air & Space Forces Association, honoring and supporting our Airmen, Guardians, and their families. Find out more at afa.org
